reg_info.act_under: Employee Share Ownership Plan Act   Loi sur le régime d’actionnariat des employés

content.content: 1. An annual return to be filed by an administrator under paragraph 7 of subsection 2 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. An annual return to be filed by an administrator under paragraph 7 of subsection 2 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 1.

content.content: 2. An application for certification of an employee group under subsection 4 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. An application for certification of an employee group under subsection 4 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 2.

content.content: 3. An application for registration of an employee share ownership plan under subsection 5 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. An application for registration of an employee share ownership plan under subsection 5 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 3.

content.content: 4. A certificate of eligibility under subsection 7 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. A certificate of eligibility under subsection 7 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 4.

content.content: 5. An annual return to be filed by an eligible corporation under subsection 9 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. An annual return to be filed by an eligible corporation under subsection 9 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 5.

content.content: 6. An employee grant application under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. An employee grant application under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 6.

content.content: 7. An investment confirmation certificate under paragraph 7 of subsection 2 (1) and clause 12 (3) (a) of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 7.
content.raw_html: 7. An investment confirmation certificate under paragraph 7 of subsection 2 (1) and clause 12 (3) (a) of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 7.

content.content: 8. A corporation grant application under subsection 13 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 8.
content.raw_html: 8. A corporation grant application under subsection 13 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 8.

content.content: 9. An employee group grant application under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 9.
content.raw_html: 9. An employee group grant application under subsection 14 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 9. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 9.

content.content: 10. A notice of objection under subsection 17 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 10. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 10.
content.raw_html: 10. A notice of objection under subsection 17 (3) of the Act shall be in Form 10. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 10.

content.content: 11. A statement of disposition of shares under subsection 5 (3) of Regulation 318 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in Form 11. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 11. 11. A statement of disposition of shares under subsection 5 (3) of Regulation 318 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 shall be in Form 11. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 317, s. 11.
